body: I think having this here makes sense because we want to keep the specification of loop nodes 1:1 with the ONNX: https://github.com/onnx/onnx/blob/master/docs/Operators.md#Loop. This is an implementation detail of the interpreter, and represents a delta from the "standardized" schema. The fact that we have this probably indicates that we need to change the standardized schema so that it matches, but I think that is something for the future
